content: शक्य {%<ab>pot. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Possible, practicable, capable of being done or effected (usually with an <ab>inf.</ab>); श क्यो वारयितुं जलेन हुतभुक् <ls>Bh. 2. 11</ls>, <ls>R. 2. 49</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">54.</ls> {@--2@} Fit to be effected. {@--3@} Easy to be effected. {@--4@} Directly conveyed or expressed (as the meaning of a word); शक्योऽर्थोऽभिधया ज्ञेयः <ls>S. D. 10.</ls> {@--5@} Potential. (The form शक्यं is some times used as a predicative word with an <ab>inf.</ab> in a passive sense, the real object of the infinitive being in the <ab>nom.</ab> case; एवं हि प्रणय वती सा शक्यमुपेक्षितुं कुपिता <ls>M. 3. 22</ls>; शक्यं…अविरलमालिंगितु पवनः <ls>Ś. 3. 7</ls>, विभूतयः शक्यमव प्तुमूर्जिताः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 11.</ls>).
